name: MorphShift Wars
summary:
Morph Shift Wars… take a dogfight game; add a bit of sci-fi; sprinkle in some custom shape-shifting aircraft; pour in lots of enemies; sit back and wait for the carnage.

Combining the very best of sci-fi and aerial dogfighting gameplay, MorphShift Wars delivers a totally new gaming experience. Create your very own shape-shifting vehicle and control both the sky and the ocean.

Build your own bespoke aircraft, from mainframe to wings. Dominate the skies then watch your aircraft morph in to a silent underwater killing machine as you chase your enemy in to the darkest depths of the ocean.
